UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Landornamides: Antiviral Ornithine-Containing Ribosomal Peptides Discovered through Genome Mining
Literature.Author: Bösch NM, Borsa M, Greczmiel U, Morinaka BI, Gugger M, Oxenius A, Vagstad AL, Piel J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lymphocytic choriomeningitis virus (LCMV)(IC50 I=2.14µM),Mouse fibrosarcoma MC57G(no activity data)
